attributes.additional_details: Because it takes two to have a child so why is it that just because the mum says your not seeing the child the man has to suffer plus pay for the suffering as well. Men are humans too
attributes.background: Why should farther s have to pay child maintenance to there ex's when they don't see the children. Just because the relationship has ended and the mum has stopped the dad seeing there kids

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about the rights of fathers to see their children, but we're not exactly sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition which we've published that calls for parental alienation to be made a specific criminal offence: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643638
